Entry.JapaneseText: アイフリードのお宝、か…… どんな金銀財宝が眠ってるんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: Aifread's treasure, huh... I wonder what riches of gold and silver lie inside...

Entry.JapaneseText: 宝が手に入ったら、それを売ったお金で、 新しい服が欲しいな♪
Entry.EnglishText: If we can get our hands on it, then I wanna sell the booty to get some new clothes!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、じゃあ、私はピアスね。
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, I'll get myself some earrings then.

Entry.JapaneseText: わ、わたし……欲しい医学書が……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'll... get the medical textbooks I want...

Entry.JapaneseText: だあぁぁぁッ!! ダメだっ！ 俗っぽい事ばっかり考えやがって!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaaagh! No! You're limiting yourselves to the most mundane things!

Entry.JapaneseText: 違うだろ！ お宝っていうのはもっと、こう…… 夢にあふれたもんなんだよッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: You're all wrong! Treasures are supposed to be... beyond your wildest dreams!
